review: Player unknowns battlegrounds is a phenomenal game! However it does have some pretty huge cons as well. If you just want to read one review that breaks down all the pros and cons of the game and although I do reccomend it this review may convice you NOT to buy it because again it has it's issues. The first part of this review will be a bulleted list of everything the game succeds at and everyting it fails at anything marked with * I will go into more detail in on the second half. Pros Fun fast pased gameplay and gunplay* Revolutionizes battle royale based games* Good graphics (sorta) Realistic type shooting and driving mechanics The adrealine rush game*Cons Very poorly optomized as of right now* Incredbily horrid community* Not enough character or area customization* not enough game modes*Fun gameplay The gameplay of this game is incredibly fun. Your instantly thrown into a game of 100 people and have to wait no more than a minute to get right into the action. There's a ton of differn't weapons and weapon attachments. All of the guns in this game have uniqe characteristics that once you get used to one regardless of its actuall prowess you will get attached because you know how to use that gun specifically better than its counterparts and I love that. Revolutionizes battle royale Battle royale is a very new game type and the only games that exist (That are relavent any way) that also have this are H1Z1 and day z. They completly fall flat to this game in almost every aspect and this could very well be the start of an usher of amazing battle royale type games. The adrenaline rush game I've never felt more of a kick while playing any other game in my life! When your in that single digit alive club and the cirle starts to close up real tight you start hearing your heart racing! and although some people may not like this i'm sure the great majority of people would because it will make that victory all the better. now onto the consVery poorly optimized I know this game is still in early access and they are plannning on fixing it but it has to be said. If you don't have a beefy computer do not buy this game at least not yet. You will open it up attempt to pay it on the lowest settings and then realize how futile it is and that you just lit $30 on fire. It's a huge issue that needs to fixed immedatly if people are going to be playing this game for a long amount of time which I hope they do. And this is also why I said the game sorta has good graphics. 99% of the people playing can't play it on anything higher than low settings which obviously makes the game look god awful. This is truly a damm shame because if you turn the game on ultra for a second just to get a look at it it looks pretty damm good.Community The community for this game is awful if you turn your voice chat on longer than 5 secconds in a solo game you will instantly become deaf due to people with mics trying to ear becasue its funny even though its not 12 year olds screaming and a grown man yelling at everyone to shut up. Every. single. time. And on top of this if you kill someone they can still talk to their killer through a mic so what they do 9/10 times is scream call you a cheater or just salty name calling. All very loud and obnoxious fortunatly there is an ailment to this. Mute all. Character and area customization The character customization in this game is a joke. You have a ton of generic looking people with the same exact body type and the same 5 hairstyles running around it truly feels as though your character was made for you. You have these crates that will give you random drops of clothes and cosmetics but they're all so bland and ordinary. The coolest looking thing you can get in the game is a trench coat and even that looks pretty meh. On top of this lack of innovation there's only one map it is pretty fatiguing losing a couple rounds in a row pretty quickly and just doing the same in the same spot over and over there definitly going to need to add more maps if this game is going to have a lifespan of over another year. Not enough game modes This game does one thing and it does it well battle royale but I just feel like it needs something else. Doing the whole battle royale thing for over a couple hours can make you bored and then your going to want to take a break from the entire game becasue there isn't anything else to do in it. There doesn't need to be something else huge in the game but just something simple would be a nice little break inbetween games something that isn't too off from battle royale but doesn't have the whole half an hour plus games and the 1/100 chance to win.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: If you have a wide group of friends that are competitive and also just looking to chill out and have a fun time PUBG is your game. Despite the things this game is getting bad reviews for this is a must buy. I have had some of my favorite gaming moments on this game and it hasnt even been finished yet. The game does need some optimization and the vaulting and climbing mechanics the devs are currently working on to eliminate the terribly clunky jumping mechanics in the game now. But other than that if your looking for the next big thing in PC gaming this is your game.

review: I would not recommend this game to anyone I know even to enemies. The only thing the company cares is to earn more money. Add new crates and skins? Yes! Add more crates and skins? YES! Add skins for weapons? Yes. It is important to look cool when you need to concentrate on the game play.They added new map but did not bother to add map selection. Ofcourse it is better for users to been forced play map they really do not like.Another interesting thing is to provide us with bugfixes and optimizations without even testing it. One update and added ten errors or new bugs. It is typical for me to get 5 times connection error before loading lobby.And the biggest frustration is mis synchronization of client and server. You can try to hide from bullets behind some wall but after few second of hiding you die because server desided that you still running to the wall. You can watch replay and see how person shooting not at you still sucessfully hit you.I don't understand how the company with such amount of money can't afford to hire competent developers or at least buy more powerfull servers.Still the idea of the game is good but unfortunatelly it was invented by wrong people

review: This is worth 26.99. With two current maps a new 4x4 and 8x8 kilometre map coming to the game soon there is a lot to do. I wil admit being killed by hackers or people who use recoil macros is annoying but the hackers are being dealt with well and constantly being banned. There aren't many bugs but when a new bug is found Bluehole are quick at patching these. The game is balanced however it is hard to get used to the shooting style and looting since you need to know what ammo goes for what gun and what attachments do what. It's heartbreaking to come second but relieving af when you get a chicken dinner. Overall I recommend this for anyone who likes battle royale games as it adds a whole new experience to the scene however not everyone can run it which is sad but the game is always being optimised to run better.

review: I got nothing but good praise for the gameplay of the game. It's incredibly fun and addicting. BUT the cosmetic aspect is really infuriating. I get that you need to sell crates to create revenue but why do I have to gamble with my hard earned BP to see if I get a free crate or a locked crate which ( if I wanted to open) cost 2.50 per key to open but will now just be sitting in my inventory for no good reason. It's ing stupid. Spilt the two for God sake one were you can spend your BP on free crates and one where if you wanted "special" cosmetics you could spend it on that. Is it really that hard or are they just trying to play with our minds and think "hey maybe if they have it but can't open them it will temp them to pay to open it" it's an move really. I miss the days where you had to unlock item by doing things in the game. PLEASE FIX! Cuz it really is a problem and a greedy one at that

review: Looting suspense action.. can do almost anything in this game..! Something about dropping 100 players on a large remote island to duke it out or have 4 player teams is awesome. Every round is different. Listen for footsteps or shots fired and watch out! Sometimes the play mechanics can be difficult but overall with the superb graphics and varied scenes the game is playable for hours and hours. Add a 4th map and would be worth $59.99 easily..!! Join in and have fun.. winner winner chicken dinner!!

review: I'd like to start this review by stating that I purchased Player Unknown's Battlegrounds (hereafter referenced as PUBG) with my own money and of my own volition. The game itself is generally well polished however being just shy of release there are still some bugs to be expected here and there. The important thing is that whenever there is a "Game Breaking" bug or problem with the servers the devs are willing to be up all night working to fix it. This game works well on Higher End computers however if you can't run Counter Strike on Ultra settings I'd suggest running on lower detail to maximize performance until the game is fully optimized. The game is highly realistic this being both a pro and a con in some regards. For example the mortar fire in particular is very realistic and could be traumatic to persons who've experienced it in real life. The plus side to PUBG'S realism is in that the weapons and gameplay both feel very. Experiencing hackers and laggers are about as commonplace as any other run of the mill hypetrain game however the devs have been fighting that battle as well. The most negative thing I could say about the game is the Loot Crate System for skins however that's an option that you doesn't affect gameplay too heavily. All in all I'd recommend this game over and over again. Now enough of this review time to get some Chicken Dinners!

review: For you people who liked H1Z1 or pretty much any other battle royale game you will at least LIKE this game. Not everyone will love it but I do at least.I can't list everything I want to be improved but here's some pros and cons + Great graphics if you have a good computer.+ Super intense and fun especially in late game and/or if you land in a city full of other players.+ A big variety of weapons &amp items. If you don't have a decent computer or a gaming laptop IT'S UNPLAYABLE. (Crashes lag among other things.) Mid game can be a bit boring sometimes though it's something that can only be improved by the players themselves. A LOT of bugs (though I haven't discovered many of them). Probably the most common bug is getting stuck in the loading screen when you join a game.

review: This game is slowly dying. I love the game and have sunk 1300 hours into it. But everything about it feels like amateur hour. Half the stuff they show in the trailers isn't in the game and probably never will be (some guns shields etc) The movement is clunky. Developers refuse to address community complaints like the red zone. Vehicles are still an issue. And yet we've got a whole bunch of new skins!! I'm so excited to have bland skins and emotes in a buggy game. I love this game because of the sentimental value with a game that popped my BR cherry. But I can't support developers that are so out of touch with their community.

review: Yes keys for crates are breaking the "no paid content until release" promise. And yes I can live with that. The argument put forth that this stuff needs some real world testing to avoid greater hiccups once the game is considered to be "final" seems reasonable to me. Also since these paid crates contain cosmetic stuff that does not offer any advantage in terms of gameplay (in other words no "Pay2Win") I've no issues. Free crates do still exist and as far as I observed their content has not been reduced in any way.The game itself is great albeit still somewhat buggy and with occasional server issues. But its still in Early Access and gets improved regularly so I've no major reason to complain and can fully recommend PUBG for what it is )

review: What I would consider one of the best Battle Royal games if you're looking too play seriously and don't want to deal with building mechanics and similar gimmicks. Somewhat buggy especially on the miramar map but I find it in no way makes the game awful. This game is great to play with squads as this game heavily relies on teamwork but solo is fun in itself as it consists of small 1 on 1 skirmishes and I find is good for practice and training. One of my strong negative points is the loot boxes which most require a $10 key to open in a game that already costs nearly $40 having a lootbox system that requires money makes the company seem greedy. Luckily these loot boxes don't have strong impact ahead of looks so it's passable. What I hate most about this game is that there is no server lock meaning people from other serves like the asian or european servers can join the North American server. This doesn't seem like an issue except these people abuse ping lag out games hack a heavy amount and don't speak english in a team based game. Luckily this game is in a state called "Fix PUBG" where the developers are fixing stuff like this so hopefully these two major problems will be fixed sometime soon. Even with these two negative points I would recommend this game but it needs fixing.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Want a more realistic and intense gunfights compared to fortnite? Then this is the choice for you if things like Arma Insurgency or Squad. The inventory system reminds me of arma combined the Day Z mod. Movement allows for mantling and going prone to hide in wait of someone allowing for really nice stealth runs. Crates can earn you some money i made 80 bucks off a denim jacket the first crate i got so i was really happy the game paid for itself twice over. It does have its issues since hit detection is in need of a lot of work along with content patches. It feels like the game is missing something a little more "fun" in it.

review: &gt Be me poor modder in mommy's basement&gt Make Arma 3 mod based off of Japanese movie I saw&gt Explodes people actually donate to my patreon&gt Make enough off these gullible 10 year olds who think they are playing an immersive tactical shooter to buy my own apartment.&gt but it's not my moms&gt Work part time so I can put my blood sweat and tears into updates for my mod&gt As Arma 3 is dying see viable money in making scheme&gt Work with Daylight to make H1Z1 King Of The Kill&gt It's not awful but they fire me and it up they don't make too much money and I don't make any&gt Still live in apartment&gt MFW Bluehole Interactive rando devs contact me&gt They want me to make a game and promise not to make it up&gt Toil for long hours to craft my masterpiece&gt Use UE4 so it can't be anything like Arma&gt Make it tactical like Arma somehow anyway&gt Literally masterpiece&gt Beta explodes its popularity everyone hyped&gt Bluehole gives big paycheck almost have enough money saved for a nice house&gt Release game top seller on Steam the largest games platform immediately&gt $30 million first month&gt $150 million next few months&gt Literally a millionaire buy a nice house bigger than what I was expecting or even wanted&gt Bathe in cash daily still respect players who gave me the money and give quality content updates and patches&gt One day visited by Valve employee&gt He shows me a mystical crate accompanied by a key&gt Go for key want to open crate&gt No no no&gt I must pay $2.50 for the key&gt Do so with the cash that was previously used as toilet paper&gt Open crate get a glock 17 with pink spray paint all over it&gt Former harlem gang members weapon jams all the time&gt Genius.exe&gt Charge $2.50 for keys to get cosmetics in my game&gt MFW idiot kids actually buy them&gt Why didn't I do this earlier.txt&gt ethics strip the consumer dry lmao&gt MFW Bluehole agrees&gt MFW game changes from good into hole but money is seeping out of my eyelids so idc

review: I bought the game very recently but after at least 5 matches of PUBG I asked and got a refund. Not because I'm like bad at shooters which I'm not its because honestly it's just boring and completely unfair most of the time too many stalemates and when you do get killed you get killed in a bulls**t way. Because of the other person saw me when I couldn't see him at all. The combat just feels horribly unbalanced between the attacker and the defender. Even the team play isn't that fun. it's all because of that third person camera. The reason that Levelcap listed here is why I refunded the game.And yeah other third person shooters like GTA V have the same problems but at least your death results in the end of the game. These are the same reason. Granted that's just me but in my opinion It's insane how much attention this game got after just a few months of being released. I can say regardless of anything that this game is NOT worth 36.99 (CAD) on steam. Hell to the no.

review: I've sunk my fair share of hours into this game and here's my conclusion after the Sanhok release. I want to like this game but with the lack of improvements on gameplay/optimization I can't be excited or recommend this to anyone looking to just now purchase. The added content is great and I could care less about the cosmetic loot crates but the more important aspect of gameplay is not being improved. I run an i7 7700k/1060gtx and still struggle to have smooth gameplay between hit reg rendering and general clunky movement and gunplay. This was acceptable before full release but the improvements made since then are hardly noticeable. The amount of money this game has made does not reflect in the product.TL DR Cool idea and continuous content lack of gameplay improvement from pre release.

review: First of all all things considered I am not saying this game is bad per se but in the state that it finds its self it is no longer a title that can be looked at in awe in the battle royal genre. This game had potential unfortunately in the state that the game finds its self I can no longer recommend it. Especially with other titles like fortnite and Roe improving on the mistakes that blue hole made during the development of their game. The latest update was clearly rushed for the holidays regardless of whether or not it was ready for such a release its season pass is riddled with bugs on day one with massive ui issues and the such. In addition on the last game I played today my friend was basically invisible we could not see him at all. With such game breaking bugs being introduced to the main branch it is clear that they did not have stability in mind when rushing the new update but instead it was money. On top of all of the poor business decisions with their ridiculously overpriced microtransaction and pushed content I do not think anyone should consider buying this game until the company starts to shape up.

review: This game is not noob friendly at all. There is no practice or training mode you are mostly going to be spawned next to 3 5 people who will know what to do when you do not and those people will kill you ruthlessly. I cannot get past landing on the ground in this game no matter what advice I follow. Someone always follows me no matter how far away I try to get from people. The moment I get into a house to actually grab the first gun I see someone had already blasted me dead in one shot with a shotgun. I have no time to learn the game at all. I wouldn't recommend this game to any new players. I've found H1Z1 to be a much better experience and it is a free to play game with a training mode in it.

review: This game is not for everyone. If you like tactical shooters king of the hill games and the general idea of fearing for your life where ever you are then this game is for you.A lot of people say this game is overhyped that might be the case but that doesn't mean there is a big part of the community which actually really likes the game including me. Hackers ARE a problem definitely. Mostly in the higher ranks but even as a player in the top 25 thousand I've been killed by hackers which is just infuriating if you loot 20 minutes to get killed by someone who is cheating.Dispite what people say blue hole is working on their game and the issues with it. They are not as experienced as EA for example because they are new to the multiplayer game market. They include new content like vaulting new guns and maps (mostly) regulary. Yes there are microtransactions but hell they are purely cosmetic and it's only a 30 game Overwatch for example is a fullprized 60 game and you can purchase lootcrates. Developers need a consistent income to finance new content and as long as it is cosmetics who the hell cares not like influences your chances of winning. The game still needs a lot of tweaking bugs and glitches are annoying and happen but its also an early acces game.But after all that's juts my opinion. I like this game. I love that feeling of finding an 8x scope or a suppressor for a Sniper I love the feeling I get being in the top 10 hitting a sweet headshot with the kar98 or running over someone with a car. Try it out if you think that's something you would like if not that's totally fine.

review: I played both the alpha and closed beta game is great other than the performance it has been released for a day now i have a i7 6600k 16 gig ddr3 ram and a 1080 video card and there are times where i get 20 30 fps sometimes lower i have friends who have worse computers that dont even meet the miminum requirements and they get 60+ all the time game is very poorly optimized but the DEV's have stated they are shooting to have the game running lag free and smooth by April 4th with that being said this is not H1Z1 this is a tatical game in most cases 1 or 2 bullets and you die you can just drive around in a car and for the love of God dont jump out while its moving unless you enjoy dieing anyway game is great still gun mechanics are amazing the bullet registry is great if you dont have a top of the line computer i would wait for the optimization patches to hit then pick it up if you got 29.99 USD to spend buy it you will love it and wont regret it.

review: Ignore all the recent hate in regards to the devs' treatment of stream snipers. The subreddit for this game decided to all simultaneously express their hatred toward people who make a living playing video games.If you don't want to get banned stream sniping. Don't stream snipe. It's basically the equivalent of peeking at the other player's screen in local multiplayer games. Don't do it. You wouldn't like it if somebody else was intentionally joining your games and looking at your screen the entire time to find out your exact location.

review: I can only recommend this game. Easy to learn easy to grasp hard to truly master and if you die you're right into the next match again. Put in mind that this game is still in Early Access but it certaintly playable at this stage even though the game still needs a lot of optimaization. Saw a comment that they went p2w which is far from the truth. It's pay for cosmetics and you will absolutely not be able to buy anything that will grant you an advantige ingame. Warning They do ban people if you cheat if you team up in soloes and if you stream snipe. Have seen it countless times which I certaintly approve of. Game is not perfect but they constantly add new stuff and deliver what they promise and new cosmetics and weapons etc. are added to the game from time to time. There is currently one map but they have promised that there will be more. This is more of a hybrid between the more hardcore version of battle royale from the mod from Arma3 and the more casual H1Z1 which essentially reach out to both groups. They nail it in my opinion. Really good game still in early access (put that in mind)!I certiantly recommend it and the price is very reasonable.

review: Pretty good! But can be kind of frustrating since you often get shot out of nowhere and you dont even get to see a replay of whom/from where you got shot. Dont expect it to be call of duty like its mostly medium/long range combat/sniping. Collecting gear and weapons can be a bit tedious especially if you get ganked just as you completed the perfect setup..Best strategy is probably to seek out combat until you are good enough at it so you can grab the stuff the other players spent time collecting.Expect to spend a fair amount of time tweaking graphics settings for good performance.

review: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS is a battle royale shooter that pits 100 players against each other in a struggle for survival. Gather supplies and outwit your opponents to become the last person standing.This game is really good all the players kill each other in order to survive until the end to eat the Chicken Dinner.The graphics are also pretty good which supports high end pc and other HD settings.For animation is also very good. There are many awesome effects such as explosions blood bullets and so on.But there are still many problems to occur because no game is 100% perfect. Such as drop FPS lag lots of bugs wall through vehicles and many more. Especially drop FPS and strutter which makes me so disappointed. I have a fairly high spec PC and it seems like my pc is fine. There is no problem in the internet RAM processor graphics card etc. Also server problems that are very difficult to connect. I hope the developer can resolve this many issues soon.Overall the game is worth it for you to buy because the game is already in Esports and very interesting to try.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: While the games is fun and has it's moments PUBG is pretty much a lucky you won battlegrounds game. It really come down to who see who first and who is the luckiest shot. Too many times I've been the first one to shoot but an AR against an A12K is a losing fight at close range. Also I have come to the conclusion most FPS game of this type have a major problem with LINE OF SIGHT!As for me personally I have given up playing the PUBG solo I will now only play Duo's or squads as any game is funner to play with friends. Bottom line if PUBG ever comes out of Early Access it might be an awesomely optimized game but as for now just deal with its issues and have fun playing this mess that's way better than H1Z1.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: The sad thing about this game is its amazing potential and how far it is from achieving that potential. Don't get me wrong the game is fun and exciting. The scenery looks nice. But the gameplay is a roulette wheel at best. You want to shoot through this window? Sorry there's an impenetrable wood bar at the exact level of the gun barrel. Want to peek around this corner as you know there's aguy coming around? Well that's humurous as you are going to shoot the doorframe. Sniped by a shotgun? Probably. Can't hit the broadside of a barn with the same choked shotgun? Also probably. There are a ton of things that the devs have promised that they haven't delivered. Cheaters run fricking rampant. Servers are terrible. Optimization hasn't occurred even though they promised it long ago. Wait for the full release whenever that comes. It will be good once it gets the attention it needs. It is sorely lacking that attention.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: This game keeps getting better.The developers are releasing new updates fixes and improvements evey month and they intend to keep this scedule.H1 might be better in terms of performance and physics in some ways but this game feels more realistic than H1 and more competetive also. (not to mention the bigger gun variety and also the attachments)And the fact that Daybreak studios hardly ever releases a new update (shotgun most unbalanced i ve ever seen) for their game makes Playerunknown more interesting cause the developers care about their game.The reviews for this game are constantly rising and thats why i can see a bright future for PUBG. We know H1 got a lot of hate in the past weeks because of PUBG and dont get me wrong its a good game but we players want that you take care and maintain your games (Valve pls fix CSGO)i can only recomend this game you wont regret it 8/10 see you on the Battlegrounds )

review: I paid around 1K INR on this game and a few months back my steam account got compromised. The culprit had commited fraudulant activity by trying to either cheat (ingame) or misuse my market and PUBGC banned me permanently stating that my account is my responsibilty. Valve was considerate enough wrt the misue of my Dota 2 profile and inventory where in PUBG Corp. proved to be real s. I can't seem to play this game on my smurf accounts either. I've paid and bought a lot of games that are worth the money I spent on them and PUBG was on the list until they showed their true colours when someone tried TFW my account.There are innumerable frauds and hackers who make it their job to get into someone's account by any means possible. I've not even clicked on any of those "get items for free/get credits for free" kinda phishing scam and I'm the bad guy here.Shame on you Bluehole Corp.I can't use your game neither can I sell it back to you for a refund. I recommended a lot of people to go forward and buy this amazing game but it's the game that's benign. YOUR Anti Cheat Policies are not defined to protect and withold customers who paid you to play this game.SHAME ON YOU.

review: PUBG's been improving since the beginning. Optimization is pretty good now. I can get solid 100+ fps with ultra settings. No significant frame drop. And idk why but I haven't met any hackers yet after the official launch of the game which is very surprising. I would absolutely recomment this game to all of my friends.吃鸡从一开始的惨不忍睹发展到现在这样 值得称赞 优化已经改良了很多 从以前的动不动就崩溃 帧数瞬间跌到10 到现在的最高画质稳定110fps是很大的进步了 正式发售后死妈的挂逼们貌似也少了 挂逼们再死一些的话我是绝对会把这游戏安利给周围朋友的 배그가 맨 처음 쓰레기 최적화 쓰레기 서버때에 비하면 졸라 많이 발전하긴 했네. 프레임 졸라 딸리던 배그가 지금은 풀옵에 110프레임으로 달림. 시바놈에 해커들도 좀 적어진것 같고 해커놈들 씨가 마를때쯤이면 친구놈들 더 끌어드릴거.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: So PUBG is truly a great game. Competitive game mechanics fun weapons funny ways to die. I recommend this game for those who like FPS's the battle royale genre and a fun time. But... the game has a lot of problems. DO NOT get this game if you easily dislike a game because of numerous problems. The devs have put a lot of love and work in this game but it still has a ways to go and many problems to fix including Places where one can get stuck The deathcam and replay system (bullets do not ever hit anyone it is delayed) Car mechanics. For example today I had my 2 favorite guns when I got out of my car and it lightly pushed me causing me to fly 20 feet and die. Parachute mechanics (I often lose half of my health or more because of rubberbanding and other issues when dropping) Issues with region locking and foreign players. Non China servers are infested with Chinese players and no one is happy about it. There needs to be a region lock. Also sometimes my region gets set to Asia automatically causing me to join those server and waste my time. Other than these issues (and more that I have not encountered) I think PUBG is truly a great game and it still can become more perfect.

review: PUBG a 100 man (Usually 96 man) FFA fight to the death gun game! I have about 100 hours on this game and just the past 2 weeks ive gained over 34 hours this game is not for everyone however.__________________________________________________________________________________Playablity This game can be difficult to pick up if you have played other games such as Overwatch or CoD on PC they will transfer skill set in a way. Though the graphics arent always the best theyre definately inproveing and if you have it on MAX settings your game will look stunning. ________________________________________________________________________________PUBG vs. Fortnite Here we go. This is really based on opinion when it comes down to it but ive played 50 hours on fortnite and i can say I find much more enjoyment in this much more realistic game. If you were to compare everything PUBG would in theory win statistically but the Fanbase doesnt always agree with statistics.________________________________________________________________________________Price And is it worth it? HECK YES I origanally thought this game was a $60 game but no its $40. I highly recommend this game and if i had control of the prices i would raise it even.________________________________________________________________________________Bugs? Oh buddy yes there are bugs! But the dev team has not abandone this title keep in mind! People who say they have are just wrong.________________________________________________________________________________Hackers and Cheaters? In the 92 hours of gameplay i have run into 3 hackers. Thats not very much yes very annoying to be killed by them but whats 3 deaths?________________________________________________________________________________Community? Very toxic on the plane although somtimes you will find one or two people who are very pleasent to hangout with.________________________________________________________________________________Multiplayer? Very much so its very rewarding to win a solo queue match! But its even better when you can share your success with one or even 3 more players! Squads are enjoyable not very toxic but most the time people dont have mics.________________________________________________________________________________Regions China is very preasent even on the NA servers. So dont think you will avoid them... cause you wont but most the time you'll be fine if you dont squad up!________________________________________________________________________________OVERALL SCORE?! 8.5/10 Extraordenary game! Like any game it needs work. But with a little TLC you'll see it grow!

review: 8 Square kilometers of Battle Royale bliss!https //youtu.be/FXkpMYI9RioJump out a plane and skydive onto a massive island where everyone is trying to kill you.PlayerUnknown's Battleground is my first dive into the world of battle royale arenas and i have to say i am quite impressed by it.The general quality of the game is really good but does lack that little bit of polish but saying that the is has only just been released on Early Access so i'm sure that will improve in time and i'm not saying it looks bad in anyway.The sounds are really good and you get to hear the other players running around the house you're in or when they are close by. Guns shots will ring out across the map and can give/will away your location to people looking for a fight.It's got a leveling system too.....of sorts fight to gain exp to unlock some goodies in the form of bonus loot crates. I was in the closed beta for this game and since it's release on early access it has come down with a case of the lag. In the early stages of the game it suffers the most trying to deal almost 100 people at the start of the game really shows the strain on the servers but once the herd is thinned slightly it does ease off.There are a huge varity if weapons to pick up ranging from a classic frying pan for up close and personal encounters to silenced snipers rilfes for you want to sit a the back of the bus and take them out from a distance. Almost all of the guns can be upgraded with attachments when you pick them up.There is only one map at the moment but hopefully that will change in the future. There is only one game mode type but you can either do it solo Duo up with a friend or Squad it up with a bunch of friends! if you don't have any friends to play with online then you'll get randomly paired or squaded up with other players. So be talkative as you are going to need to work as a team to survive.So it's got a massive map a health amount of equipment to use cars to drive (don't jump out of them when they are moving or you'll run yourself over....trust me i've done it) and lots of heart pounding moments when you hope no one sees you as you have not picked up a weapon yet!If you have not played a battle royale game yet then this is definitley not a bad place to start.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: This game had great potential to be very good game. It has huge player base and massive sales all over the world.But even with this succes the game is garbage. Since the early access nothing really changed except addition of few new guns cars loot crates cosmetics and map. After release game is still filled with bugs random crashes and cheaters. Hitboxes sometimes just doesn't work and even if I shoot somebody and see blood splashes nothing happens.A lot of times I get stuck with my parachute having to cut it off and falling down which takes most of my health but that's not the worst.What really pisses me off is the input lag. I don't know why is the input lag so distinct. Maybe its the lack of ping lock.Another problem is gameplay. Every game you literally have to loot for 10 15 mins. just to die from some cheater and yes this game is packed with cheaters. Almost every third game there is one.Conclusion BUGS BUGS BUGS AND CRASHES INPUT LAG CHEATERS GAME DEFINITELY DOESN'T FEEL LIKE FULL RELEASE+FUN GAME+EASY TO JUMP IN AND JUST PLAY+NO WAITING FOR MATCHMAKING+PRICEI will keep occasionally play this game hoping for fixes.

review: I mean I'm not sure if I'm currently in a position to give the best judgement on the game but from my experience so far (34 hours at the time of posting) I can't in good conscience recommend it Pros Its a pretty fun time with friends mostly The original map is pretty fun overallCons I'm not sure if there are many hackers in the game but so far I've only come across 2 blatant aimbotters (considering the amount of people playing I'd say its fine but I guess its cos I've not played for long enough) The Desert map although in theme is not fun at all with basically no cover for large portions of the map letting people with scopes just shoot you from some random hill a billion kilometers away The Hitreg is kind of off sometimes (only a slight problem at least for me) The biggest problem are the servers for me (at least 40 mins were spent waiting for "servers are too busy" screen) (sometimes in the middle of games I'd get network errors and once in the middle of a firefight)Honestly if they manage to get their servers running consistantly then I would recommend this if you just have some time to kill with friends

review: The movement in the game is tricky to get used to it's a bit clunky in game. Also the game is a very GPU demanding game. I currently have a 980ti but i still need to play on the lowest setting to be able to walk around but then there is still some issues you literally need a 1080ti to be able to run this game at a good setting. Pros and Cons Below Pros Fun with friends Updates regularly with new maps and bug fixes Bullet drop (This is a realisting feature meaning you need to take distance into play) Different Gamemodes Duo's squads etc Massive map for a 100 player PVP Good passtimerCons Connection problems occur very often Game crashes a lot this is a common problem Hard for new players to get into Price tag 26 is expensive for any battle royale game at least 15 would be decent Need a decent gaming computer to run the gameI haven't gotten the most amount of hours in this game (no hate) Overall I'm recommending this game as it is fun to play and i do enjoy it.

review: Besides the obvious things everyone else is saying about corporate greed just avoid this game because it is absolute garbage. Everytime they release a decent patch they destroy the game with the next one it's an endless cycle of incompetence.. They refuse to fix their god awful servers and optimization and instead rely on trying to make money by adding crates.To be fair I was all about this game for a long time and I really felt the last patch went in the right direction. It wasn't great but it felt smoother and slightly more polished. Now after this most recent one I have so far died to a guy shooting me two more times after I rounded a corner (couldn't even see me anymore in the killcam) punched a guy out only to die from him shooting me as I was looting his body. (kill cam was literally me crouched on his body and 2 bullets coming from nowhere). And finally having the wonderful experience of using the S12k on some guy that was standing still only to have him turn and 1 shot me upon review none of my shots did any damage and he was rubberbanding. As a slight sidenote whichever at bluehole thought "hey people that play FPS games absolutely love not having a gun to shoot" should be fired immediately. there is nothing fun about landing at a place like po i/pecado/military base then searching 5 building or half of a barracks and getting nothing not even a pistol. Bring back the patch when you released the vector where you could enter any building in the game and get like 2 AR's or at least an SMG.At the end of all of this all I can really say is in its current state I recommend no one buys this game. And unless they take a lonnggg look at themselves (yea right to busy suing people for no reason) this game will remain trash.

review: Here comes my review for PUBG I only played it for a few hours but i do can say that it's worth a recommendation. I mean it's not perfect that's for sure but many people are ignoring the fact that Bluehole is trying to make the game worth the 30 bucks.Which it isn't right now.30 bucks are a bit of a price for PUBG it's is not fair enough to justify that. It has a variety though There are (as of September 2018) 3 maps 2 big ones and 1 small one. That's a number and makes sure that you won't be playing on the same boring map all the time. The amount of different weapons and attachments is decent too. And even the vehicles are varied enough.But what my point is is that the skins and other accessoires are mostly paid which would be no problem because it's optional but it took the sense out of the Battle Points system and since you paid 30 bucks (or a bit less if you got a good deal) you don't want to have a feature that you can't even use properly without paying more.My suggestion A leveling system attached to something similar to a battle pass. Not that seasonal battle pass where you are forced to play 24/7 to get the coolest item of it but more like a permanent one where you climb the level ladder into infinity and get a nice item for every level up. Transform the total BP a player has earned in his career to XP and everyone is happy. This gives PUBG another feature and you can leave the current system in for those who don't want to wait for an item. If Fortnite takes your Battle Royale take their Battle Pass! And don't be happy with the current piece of the Battle Royale fanbase. Reach for it as a whole! It would be very helpful if you upvote this review if you agree so the others and Bluehole see that PUBG has potential to be the best Battle Royale and that it does can die like H1Z1 if it's not being cared about enough.

review: The opening months of this game were pretty exciting to be a part of. The boom this game had was unlike anything else I've ever experienced. Then it just got bad for a while. The hackers were so blatant and there were at least a dozen in every match i had for a time. I took a break hoping Bluehole would address the issue. There has been some efforts to curb hacking and the game has had multiple updates with a couple new maps since launch. I would honestly like to say I enjoy playing the game but theres 1 problem. I can't play it....it's been broken for me for about 3 months. I've uninstalled and reinstalled and it only crashes. My crash report also crashes so instead of beating my head on my desk about it I'm just done playing PUBG i guess. I've never once cheated at the game so that can't be my issue. Have fun and hopefully they region lock china for the people that still want to play. I'm out!

review: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds is the perfect Battle Royal game. Everything from the fluid controls to the rich detail put into game maps mechanics and stability make this a great game for any gamer of the shooter genre. The concept of the battle royal is perfectly impliment in PUBG. The objective of being the last one alive is a thrilling rush of excitment when you finally achieve the Winner Winner Chicken Dinner. Even though i am not an expert and probably only win a game one out of 50 times the game is still able to bring me back again and again. The controls are not very hard to understand and they are easy to pick up and learn. The continous updates and support for the game is unbelievable. The developers continue to make the game better and add richer details to every new map. If you are a fan of the shooter genre I highly recommend this game. For a price of $29.99 and continues free updates this game is totally worth every penny.

review: When I initially played the game it was a lot of fun and a new experience to me but as the months have gone on the updates they've added have only made the game less and less optimized for me to the point of unplayability. The servers are so bad that you will constantly be shot while behind cover due to latency issues. The spawn rate for weapons is disgusting you will run into whole houses with nothing but a helmet and a back pack. The addition of the rain map makes the audio queues irrelevant on that map which is a majority of how you tell where someone is in the game. On top of all of that there has been a massive influx of chinese speaking players on the NA servers so if youre expecting to play squad with someone that speaks your language you better bring friends. I don't see a reason to purchase this game save your money and let this game burn.

review: I want to point out something that you'll find very odd later in this review I don't like BR games. This was the first one I bought and at first when it was in early beta stages I hated it as well. I was always good at it. In solo I rarely die before the final 10 players but i just don't like the game mechanics in BR games. I always found it cheesy and stupid that a colored wall pushes players toward one another to force fighting instead of other games like Escape from Tarkov where resources and missions and looting push players into certain zones instead of a silly enclosing wall as I'm more of a realism shooter person anyway. That being said after giving this game a very long break refusing to play it with firends and not putting any time in I started watching streamers and saw how they were enjoying the game so i decided to see if it had improved since i played it.The first thing i did after reinstalling it was check settings and run a test to see if it performed better and oh boy does it run so much better than it used to. I don't exactly have a beefy set up but my system has no problem playing with pretty much everything on high. The second thing i did was just click the quick join to see how long it took to get into a match and see how playing with randoms would be. Boy was aI shocked. I had more sucessful 4player teams than I could have imagined. Being a long time CS player playing with randoms usually means a lot of novice players but I was paired multiple times with top 5 teams and although i was paired several times with teams that died in the first 60 seconds of hitting the ground i was still having fun becuase I could hop right into another game on a different map andusually get a better team. And in the first night of playing the game I actually won a match with 3 random guys. I don't think I've ever seen that happen in any other game. Where 4 random people could joine up and win esspecially considering how talented a lot of the players are in this game. It honestly provides those moments that battlefield used to be known for. And I love using my nvidia software to save highlights and such and upload them for my friends to see. And that was one of those moments.So yes coming from someone that doesn't like BR won't even think about fortnite and plays mostly realism shooters I have to say this is now a game I think I will play alot more than most games because of the potential for so many fun things to happen.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Used to be good. Used to be what I wanted to play all day. Now it's just irritating.This game should still be in early access. Every "update" is more cosmetics rather than working on fixing the game or adding more maps and content.To top it off they're removing map selection now. A big you to all of us players who spent months begging them to add it in the first place. We shouldn't be forced to play your garbage map if we don't want to play it. If you're gonna make me play what I don't like then I have no reason to play the game at all.They also removed the weather system a few months ago which was the most variety this game had.And for some reason they cry and pull out their lawyers whenever they start losing to the competition who update their games with actual content every single week.Save your money

review: Warning ( I can't recommend this game right now. ) Im rolling a 980 Ti Card with 32gb of ram. In the begining i could run this game smoothly. But now I can't even get 20 fps.. It's t.. im not sure what they done or what update screwed up. but even on very low this dont work.. but im not the only one that has this problem. When this fix this.. I will remove my negative review. I love this game. It's everything H1Z1 Is not. It seems to actually know what It want and the short time It's been in development is amasing how far they got. Now.. It do have problems.. Allot.. And some I hate so bad I broke a keyboard playing this game. Let's get to it. Things I love.. Well I love the amount of guns and attachments you can find. It's really nice. Many hours in and im still finding and using guns for the first time. I love firing the guns and the reaction from when you fire from when the bullet hit the target from when the target dies feels really nice. The cars feel quite nice when you drive them actually.. Way better then I expected. The map is huge. Things I hate.. The desynch.. It happens more often then it should. Lag. People sliding around. And everything is delayed. Get in to a car 2 sec after you press F. Pick up an items. About 1.5 sec delay after you press F.. it gets tedious as hell and many times It causes your deat. Boats.. They are useless.. Theres only one major river and the barrier always come from the coast. I dont see how or why one would use the boats. At any time. your exposed in them and they take like 15 20 sec to swim out to actually get one. Semi mode on all weapons as standard. Running in to a house chased by a bad guy. you pick up a gun slam in a mag and whoops your on semi. And holding down the trigger in a 3m CQC encounter just made you pop away 1 round. Why is automatic not the standard? Semi should be the one you switch to. Bullet dropp is also wierd. Some guns have almost no drop and others have riddiculus drop. You can zero down scopes so Its workable.The crate reward system feelt nice at a start but it's just plain stupid. Instead of having a store that allows you to buy the cosmetic you want. You can only use your winning coins to buy chests. And open them to get random cloth. This sounds good at first with the coins being quite easy to get. But the chests double in price each time you get them and you can get My first chest i got a red basic shirt. It looked just like the grey black White one you started with but red. And now to chance getting a pair of blue sneakers I must pay double. Then double then double. It's ing stupid.. Either keep the chest at a reasnoble price or give me a store so i can pick my stuff.. Im not paying real money to unlock chest and chance getting crap. I hate how It's a campers fest and if you go down get in to a house get a gun and notice on the map your deep in the zone and safe It means you will camp. Cause winning getting to top 10 or winning gives you allot almost 300 500 coins. But a kill only racks for maybe 30 50 points. So sure allot of kills add up.. But taking the risk dont outweight it. And many times I feel i go down quick notice 10 other guys came to the same town. Then it becomes camp fest in every house until where forced to leave. This becomes dull as . Cheaters.. Wow.. 24hours after it came out cheats came on. And you can notice it. Some people pull of almost impossible shots with guns not made to do it. But what I feel give it away Is when your 100% Super silent in a house.you camp it for 10min not making a single sound. And someome then rushes in and shoots exactly where your hiding even tho he had maybe 8 directions/doors/rooms to pick from. Also Im not sure if this is cheat but everything is loud. you move and make really loud sounds. Even when crouching makes no diffrence your still loud. Walking slowly makes no diffrence still loud as . Somehow tho people manage to go in to the house open the door. And run or sometimes sprint up in to my back without even making a fart. Im not sure if its a glitch or cheat.And last Parachuting. It's nice that you get to decide where you jump off.. But holy hell many times when im parachuting down It s up. You dont need to pull the chute out yourself just go down as fast as you can and at about 150m it goes out itself. But when your 10m or so from the ground he automaticly goes in to this slow glide state thats a pain to controll and this glitches sometimes and happens at 50m.. And that Everyone will have a gun by the time your down there with only your bare fists.. It's annoiying.. I presume most things I mentioned will be fixed.. If you like H1z1 King of the kill then you will love this. It's way better. Even with optimisation It works way better. But it has its problems. I say Buy it if you want.. I Dont want to recommend at this price tho.. They should asked for like 19 99 or something. Not 29 99.. It's almost as much or even more then some full games. Give this game some time to develop Buy now to support. Or pick it up cheaper at a sale or something. Your choice.

review: Not too long ago I left this game a negative review but I have completely changed my mind. Sure this game can be furstrating but all competitve games are you just need to face the fact that if you are an average player you are not gonna win much at all so just enjoy the thrill and the gameplay you are expiriencing (which are amazing in this game)I bought this game in mid november and it was quite a mess then but the developers have done a lot to imrpove it. I'm getting way more FPS than I used to especially on the test servers.The gameplay is fluid fun and engaging. The maps (currently one in live version but the second one is up on the test servers already) are great and really fun to traverse and loot. If you have the pacience to deal with some bugs long texture loading times and minor server problems this game is a blast and is totally worth $30. GO ahead and buy it right now you will not regret it. It is especially fun with friends provides a bigger chalenge but it's easier with friends (got my first chicken dinner with my close pals just today)This game is big and abisious fun and hilarious with friends. It is far more serious than H1Z1 and less serious than DayZ which is a perfect spot for it.What are you waiting for? BUY IT!!!

So many people have asked for so many fixs but they keep adding more contant to the game more bugs and more hackers getting in. A gamer know as Shroud has a few videos of hackers flying around in cars. Dont even get me started on this "event pass" Trash. If you dont buy it you cant keep anything and you miss out on alot of XP grabs becuase you dont have the pass. so 30 for the game and 10 for the pass. They refuse to do what people ask if it doesnt make money. The game is slowly dying. Once another game comes out like PUBG you will see this game population drop by more then half again. This game was once king and has fallen into a a problem of not caring what anyone says but making money. review: Good game.Pros Good variety of weapons they can have attachments too. Fighting is beneficial (for loot) Hitboxes are pretty decent Often has updates Loot crates are high risk high reward which makes it fun and can change tide of game Fun custom games e.g zombie mode melee only sniper only etc. Large playerbase so find games almost instantly everytime (within 3seconds)Cons Poorly optimised (You will need good PC to run at constant 60+ fps) Tickrate not good. EU servers not very good In squads i think the circles close a little too fast When you connect to a server the minute countdown usually doesn't start until full or almost full wish it would start at 80 people connected whilst others still connect

review: What PUBG thaught me.+Crashing on boot.+Failed lobbys playing with friends.+Crashing loading game.+Failed landing in parachute leaving you stranded for seconds mid air.+Broken loot.+Broken sync lagg rollbacks hit register stuttering.+Broken hit box.+No region lock.+No ping cap.+Loot boxes with crappy costumization plus overvalued market.+Cheaters.+CRAPPY SERVERS.After all the hours and hours of gameplay there was more to add but this will suffice on why i do not recommend this game even with the good moments i had playing and the fk amount of hours i have.The lack of attention given to the game and gameplay and the attention to the media frenzy on movies franchise the brand IP protenction(irony is strong on this one) and China(you know what i mean )leads me to believe that they are focusing on milking the cow rather than fixing the "Service"(as they call their game)leaving us consumers(and GOD FK DAMMIT WE RAISED THIS GAME FROM THE GROUND TO WHERE IT STANDS NOW )with no chance but to play the buggy awful mess or sulk about it. And that's what i'm doing.Sulking.Cause what was once a good start of EA finished in a "Final Release 1.0" full of what isn't a fk final release.THIS IS A BATTLE ROYAL GAME and i can't play it like i should.So fk off you and your money grabbing promises.

review: So ive been playing this game since August 2017 and every issue that i had about this game a year ago (version 1 was dissapointing) has been at least recognised with most issues being on the path to being completely solved.System Performance The FPS has increased from 70 FPS in 2017 to staying in the 90s almost constantly. I play on a variety of settings going from Very Low (foliage) to Ultra (View distance). The PC is budget with an X58 board from 2010 and an RX570. Just turn a couple of settings down and you'll be good.Servers What can I say? It now selects the closest server to you. This'll stop ping abusers and cheaters connecting to servers that are far away from them although it looks like the Chinese government is doing the job anyway. Ping's good here in the UK as long as you have a decent internet speed ofc.Weapons and Balance Huge weapon range even though some guns dont appear on all maps and there is now 5 variants of an auto firing 5 point rifle (M416 QBZ AUG SCAR L and G36C) which all play rather similarly. They got rid of random spawn L3 helmets which brings the bolt action snipers back into relevancy. Overall decent balance.Good game.

review: I had a few friends suggest Running Simulator 2017 to me and at first it seemed like a great idea. You see I use to run quite a bit when I was younger but after having some personal injuries I ve not been able to run without it hurting quite a bit. At first I thought the game was odd in that you fly into the map that you run around on. Then I saw this blue wall that I had to keep running away from. After escaping the wall for a moment I ran into this dude with a gun. I mean why are there guns in this running game? So I boop him on the nose and take his gun in case there are any other crazies. Sure enough quite a few crazies. This game captures running quite well but is full of too many homicidal maniacs for me.

review: I want to love this game. I really do. However recently I just can't.It's plagued by these Chinese players that are either lagging terribly or are actually cheating like locking onto your head and killing you almost instantly.The hit reg is so bad and it's really one of the worst problems in the game. You can shoot someone directly in the head with an easy sniper shot however it'll miss. Someone can shoot 10 meters behind you and it kills you. Makes no sense.Anyways currently I don't find the game fun at all and until they fix one of these problems I would strongly reccomend not buying.

review: Updated Review I am now over 270 hours into the game and I can say it has been a fun ride! Everything from clear foggy to rainy weather. You still have some issues lingering like chain link fences/stair railings that don't allow bullets to travel through them which can be frustrating if thats where the fight happens. Recently there has been a much larger flux of Asian players also connecting to the NA servers which can be a teamkill in the making for no reason. We are still in early access so remember that. A good practice is to also record your games if you do play by yourself so you can report any TK's that do happen if you matchmake because the "Report" button alone is just a button they require video evidence with sound. Good Luck out there keep up the good work devs!

The only thing that comes to my mind when I play this is "Fun". It is my 2017 game of the year and I highly recommend getting together with a buddy or a squad and unleashing hell. Verdict 10/10

It was even worse optimized than it is now i had a GTX 980ti and the game was almost unbearable to run. on VERY LOW setting I got 43 fps. Since then the recommended graphics card and optimization have changed. The new recommended Graphics Card is GTX 1060. And the optimization has improved. review: At $30 we should be charged and convicted of grand theft 'cause this is a ing steal.It does have issues but they are all things that will be fixed throughout the Early Access development cycle. Judging from how insanely supportive and proactive the developers are I'd say the fixes will come sooner rather than later. The game has been out for what... a month? They've already released several good patches the most recent of which is an absolute delight and improves dramatically upon nearly every aspect of the game. I honestly believe when all the kinks are ironed out that this will be my favorite shooter I've ever played but as it stands now I'd give it a 9/10

review: This review is written on 31/05/2018 and describes an example round of this game in its current state. This ignores the other issues with the game like the developers abandoning the forums and player feedback and daily updates trying to patch their broken anti cheat system.I drop from plane I go through 5 buildings finding nothing but a few bags a shotgun and accessories for guns this is typical since hte past few updates when they seem to have halved the number of items that spawn probably to improve performance of the game. There is no ratio in drops of items to quadrant of map or what items drop just "quality of item" which can mean anything from silencer and decent gun to trash items.I find a car drive to next village (3 or 4 houses). Nothing in them.Drive to next village find some decent items. Drive to next village drive through a wooden fence the game crashes and asks me to report the error I can't as I need to rejoin the game.Load the game back up and resume blurry textures and empty buildings as I try to loot as the game loads. I'm impressed they manage to let me rejoin a game in progress I'll give them that.Drive to next buildings with the circle nearby loot the buildings.Next circle is on opposite side from this one.Drive car to exterior of current circle with a quick walk to next circle driving up to some buildings. Hit invisible wall in the grass with car.Get out as now I'm getting shot at and run to nearest building. Have to leave this building as circle is now drawing closer as I spend all my time healing after running to this building under fire.Run out door make it to the next circle just about but have taken significant damage from circle start healing behind tree get head shot which is the only part of this round I don't have a problem with lol.I quit Steam and even though PUBG is closed it says it is still waiting for the game to close to let me exit Steam...If this sounds like a game that you would be interested in please proceed to make a purchase.

review: Usually i dont write reviews but the rating for this game is way to high it diserves much lower ratings. First i know its an alpha stage game and i didend have high expectations graphics wise and i knew some random crashes could happen. It was mostly the gameplay that was entertaining for me. For the most part i had some enjoyable games except for when the early july patch came my game would run better for the first few games after that every game horrible lag and stuttering even after a reboot of my pc. The game becomes unplayable. Payed 30 euros for this way to high a price for such a poorly optimized alpha state game. Unplayable when the stuttering hits and no fix. Dont buy!!!

review: The game hass issues but since the 1.0 the slowly fixes all of the issues.This game is more like a love/hate relationship but i keep going back to play it. you get to top 3 and die from a headshot from nowhere or you are that guy who headshots the last guy and win. you can play both thirdperson and firstperson or firstperson only since you can peek around corners with thirdperson and if you play firstperson everyone is in firstperson mode at alltimes and eliminates that peeking trough windows/corners.This game can get really intense if you drop where everyone else drops the game gives you a real kick in the chest when your alone in a warzone with 20 other players in a small area hearing shots everywhere and it suddenly stops around 5 players left.The game gets better if you play with a duo or squad.I recommend this game since i keep going back to it alone or with others.

review: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS (PUBG) Review12/24/18A fine Monday evening and I'm here to review one of the best battle royale experiences you can enjoy. Introduction PUBG is one of the best battle royale games on the market. It is affordable and very entertaining when I play Call of Duty Black Ops 4's Blackout mode I get the sence of fast paced action with the grapple gun and all that slidng. Hell you can sprint and slide while healing. To me PUBG is just a slower paced game the Blackout and sometimes some of us enjoy a slow paced battle royale every now and then. Weapons The weapons in PUBG are all taken from real life I see some weapons that I have studied in the past for example the Kar98k the German sniper rifle. The Kar98k in PUBG portrays a similar resemblance to the rifle in real life. The Kar98k is a great rifle that has almost no bullet drop honestly the rifle comes in handy in most maps especially Miramar. Maps As of writing this review 12/24/18 PUBG has released 4 maps that you could play in which are Erangel Miramar Sanhok and Vikendi.ERANGEL Erangel is a 8x8km map and is the first playable map that PUBG has released. Erangel has small buildings and has a "foresty" look in my opinion.MIRAMAR Miramar is a 8x8km map and is the second playable map that PUBG released. Miramar is a desert map that has large open areas great for sniper rifles.SANHOK Sanhok is a 4x4km map (rather then the usual 8x8km maps) and is the third playable map in PUBG. Sanhok is a rainforest map that has lots of grass (dear god) and great for campers in my opinion. Sanhok is one of the loot rich maps here in PUBG.VIKENDI Vikendi is the fourth playable map in PUBG that has a size of 6x6km. Vikendi had just been released recently for the PC and mobile versions of the game for PS4 and XBox Vikendi will be released later on January. Vikendi is the snow map and has minimal hiding spaces because many open buildings. The Vikendi map is located in the Adriatic Sea. Community The community in PUBG is quite big and still rising PUBG is quite popular in the streaming platform Twitch and streamers there have found to enjoy PUBG for example Shroud https //www.twitch.tv/shroud and DrDisRepsect https //www.twitch.tv/drdisrespect have their own custom skins in the Ghosted crate Shroud and the Speed and Momentum Crate DrDisRespect but have been unfortunately removed.SOURCES https //pubg.gamepedia.com/https //www.twitch.tv/

review: Game itself is fine apart from the broken vehicles and gun physics. Obviously big problem with chinese cheaters which is obviously condoned by PUBG corp as they will do anything but stop it. Another problem is the proverbial middle finger given to consumers in the form of micro transactions. You grind away at the ame to earn ingame BP which you then spend on lootboxes with a maximum of 6 boxes per week which is fair enough. The problem comes when you don't get a say in which box your given as the majority of boxes require you to then go and spend $2.50 real money on a key to open it for a 99.99999% chance of getting a mediocore or trash item. From this I would highly recommend to not buy this game and instead go play fortnite for free

review: I really love this game! The other day I managed 10 kills in a solo game and won which was great. I really find the overall feel of the mechanics which are very interesting and I enojyed learning how to control my character etc.. I noticed recently when the game had the update releasing the new map called Vikendi (Which by the way is a very detailed and well made map) that there was less lag less frame drops and I got killed by desync way less often. When I did get killed by desync it was a very minor effect on whether I died anyway. Overall after that update I think PUBG has just got way better and if anyone looks to buy this game I would definitely buy it and it's worth the 26.99 because even if it seems too much it's definitely worth the value.

review: Hey so Pubg... No not Plunkbat you call it that you getting plunked by a bat (some stupid Rock paper Shotgun cry for attention). Its a good game cant say great cant say even close to perfect but good. Its fair fun and sometime downright stupid. Now i can say its a good game because Im good at it i still die but im good.Now for a real review. LOADS of bugs like EA sports half game release but its missing code not content. vehicle bugs game bugs hell even a bug to unload all 100 man battle royal the first 2 seconds of a plane trip. You got to be patient you got to put some faith in the game. Even after that it'll give you some Bat poop but still if you want an epic battle royal survival game that gets your heart pumping this is it! if you want to be the last standing out of 100... hold on a second 100!!! 1% of players in solo can actually win. insane and i love it.

review: Should of wrote a review for this a long time ago but I got lazy anyways this game when it comes to battleroyal it's truly the best one you can play yeah there's stuff that happens that's t but if you can get past the t and play with some friends this game can and will give you and your friends some amazing moments that you can only get in PUBG. If your new and just starting you got a lot too learn so try and hang in there if you get destroyed by people who been playing the game since it came out. I would recommend watching some tip videos on the game to help you learn the basics of the game. One tip I'll give because some people just completely ignore this if your playing in a third person server use third person to your advantage not only just in looking around corners but sometimes shooting in close quarters in third person is easier and faster and some of you might think that's obvious or you already do but I have heard some people say they don't ever do it and I don't know why I truly feel like it helps with certain weapons in full auto.

review: I love battlegrounds there are many other games out there that have preceded and stemmed from this But like Dr.Disrespect mentioned he feels this one has the best narrative game development. As volitile as he is. his game wisdom is about as on point as it gets. Gamers are a tough crowd. Often due to age immature attitude and self entitledness they will pass up a good thing because it isn't perfect. On stream chats it's always exhausting reading the moronic words of a guy saying a "game is trash". Although this game like everyone has had major/ minor issues I have been super impressed at how hard they have been working to make the game work. To use another comparision employees always seem to know how to run the company when in actuality if they were in the driverseat they would soon find out dealing with running the company and the PEOPLE is extremely hard to balance and tank the business. In the sam way pleasing a bunch of whiny gamers and still making the game pay has got to be ridiculosly hard. Ghost in the Shell "sunsetted" because they didn't listen to the players the top glorified players wewre clearly cheating and the in game purchase or earned rewards system was idiotic. PUBG in my opinion has listened to everything and gone to great lengths to make it happen. GITS was a fun game play and fairly accurate and satisfying but they turned the game on it head in efforts to retain gamers and it was unfortunately the last nail in the coffin Another thing that Dr.Disrepect mentioed is a game can have weak graphics atmosphere storyline but if the frag/ kill is satisfing and accurate it makes the game! "Dsync" seems to be rampant in all games of late and that is probablby the # 1 reason a player would abandon a game. How do you have fun if your shots don't hit where they are supposed to its a super fine line but on either side of it the game is great or the game is terrible. Now GITS had a good feel to it so I am kinda contradicting myself about "kill feel" but the game design and operatives became the problem so much so it overshadowed the accuracy. Oddly enough clean honest gamers will put up with a surprising amount of cheating. If they like the game it can be looked past but again there is the tipping point and Counterstike was one of them for me. Loved it but the "very bad words" cheaters ruined it. PUBG i was supposed to talk about right... PUBG has done crazy amount to remove that scum. Even getting reports back when you do report a $#!*bag cheater. and personal prefferance i have always be a 1 or 2 game kinda guy. My friends kids have a 100 games in there steam profile each with 3 hours of play shoot me in the head what a scattered unfocused existence. Really hoping PUBG goes the distance and never goes away new content is always a good thing but it cant be stupid fluffy crap. It has to appeal to the solid gamer Advanced Warfare COD with the jumping snipers rounds was curious but ridiculous. Maps are good and wow are PUBG maps incredible! So hopefully there are new maps and a continued thought out addition of guns. Quality content is what will win the day. Im not gonna edit to hard )

review: Pros *Huge world*Up to 100 people in each game*Plenty of weapons everywhere*Great variety of weapons*Weapons sound great*Explosions sound great*Graphics good for this type of game*Tense as hell especially when you're in the final 10Cons *Got that buggy feel that Arma games always seem to have. Like when you try to aim your gun and shoot through a window but the game decides you're too close to the window to be able to aim even though you're not too close to it. Hitting the tiniest stone whilst driving a vehicle can launch you into space. Funny but it's a bug.*Hackers.Conclusion The whole planet is playing this game there's no point in me even writing this review.

review: Don't buy this game. It had potential but the developers have made it clear they don't value player feedback and only care about making more money. Instead of fixing the bugs that have existed since Early Access they add new crates every month for people to pay for. Instead of giving players the option to play with weather effects (rain and fog) they COMPLETELY REMOVE all weather effects. Their anti hack software is a joke the items you get from paid and free crates are a joke the entire game has really become a joke at this point. I know people don't read reviews prior to buying games but if I can save even 1 person from wasting $30 then my time here is well spent.As of this post I've spent 610 hours on PUBG. Developers have had ample time to fix this game and they REFUSE to do it. NOBODY ASKED FOR WEAPON SKINS we want BUG FIXES yet like clockwork every month they add something new for us to pay for.

review: I picked up this game recently and I thought I'd share my thoughts as a new player.This game has a lot of unseen potential to be the best but Bluehole keep on their game and their players. I think it's clear the devs care more about their unregulated gambling than the actual game itself and don't care about the players but about the money made evident by their port to the xbox while the game was still unfinished. I got the game because honestly it seemed pretty cool. I wanted a BR game that wasn't cartoony and wasn't AS as H1Z1 and in that case the game delivers. It allows for a more realistic tactical feel. Basically when it's good its GREAT but when it's bad Its horrible. That's about all the good I can pull out my for now. To cut it short this game is VERY broken and crashes FREQUENTLY I was only on my third game when my game stopped.... and closed without warning do NOT buy or gift until game is fixed.

review: First time I've ever left a review but I just have to this time. Ive played quite a few matches now and there is one GLARING issue the hitboxes/damage. I have not found any info on how it really works but from my experience at least I can say it doesn't. One example I was on a roof in one of the main towns with an m16 and shot another player across town 5 times(blood spatters included) and he kept running. He eventually fired back and killed me in 2 hits (I had lvl 1 helm and lvl 2 police vest). The game said I was killed with the M16. SO WHY could I not take him out with 4 shots? Another instance is when I was firing through a door but my bullets were hitting the inside of the door even though my barrel was through a hole in the door. So really my main point is this game's damage and hitboxes are a bit messed up and will hopefully be fixed in the future. For now though I have to say if you easily get frustrated with being killed in t ways you might want to give it a pass for a couple patches. Rating for now (6/10) I'll give it a recommendation BUT be wary before you purchase.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS
